messages.title: Lib Dem 35-hour Childcare Pledge
messages.content: Lib Dems are pledging free, high-quality childcare from age nine months for the children of working parents.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will fund free high-quality childcare beginning at nine months for working parents.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Race to be new local MP on knife edge between Lib Dem Helen and Corbyn loyalist

issues.brexitEurope: "If we stop Brexit our economy will be stronger and we can afford to fund this free childcare," she said.

endorsements.endorsement: Join me switching to the Lib Dems

quotes.text: I will always support our great leader Jeremy Corbyn.

images.caption: Helen Thompson interacting with a child and discussing policies.
Helen Thompson and Chuka Umunna pictured discussing.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet signifies a close race in the constituency between Helen Thompson of the Lib Dems and the Labour candidate, with a focus on childcare services and Brexit.
